title: I just crafted the icon for ekko witht he 7 cores!But i need help!
body:
I just managed to craft the icon for ekko with the 7 cores but i don`t get my border!! I tried on custom playing with Darius but in the loading screen the green border doesn`t appear!!Have i done something wrong or smth?Please help!
PS:Not the icon with 750 ip!!!The blueprint!

replies.body:
The First Strike loading screen is specific to a project skinned champion, meaning it can't be used for just any champion.  Additionally, the champion and skin both need to be unlocked to unleash their first strike loading screen.  Darius does not currently have a project skin, and cannot use a first strike border.

Looking into this for you, I see that you've successfully unlocked Project Ekko's First Strike icon by fusing 7 cores with your First Strike Ekko Blueprint.  Your account, however, still needs to unlock Ekko and his project skin.  

We also have made a detailed [Project Disruption ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)guide with more information.  I hope that helps!
That's a link to recovering your account =/
Woops!  Thanks for the catch, Vekkna!  The link to[ Project Disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) has been fixed.
